acts.title: Act 1 — Unexpected Knock
steps: A visitor arrives during your custody time.
Your co-parent did not mention this.
Decide whether to allow a brief visit, set a later time, or refuse.

acts.title: Act 2 — Boundaries
steps: The visitor presses for more time.
You can enforce the boundary, compromise on a short supervised chat, or give in.

acts.title: Act 3 — Aftermath
steps: Child reacts to how the visit was handled.
Follow-up message to co-parent: neutral recap, defensive text, or no message.
